Trade/Device Name(s): Xpert® HemosIL® FII & FV Factor II and Factor V Genotyping Assay
Xpert® HemosIL® Factor II & Factor V Assay
Xpert® HemosIL® Factor II & Factor V
Regulation Name(s): Factor V Leiden DNA mutation detection system
Factor II Prothrombin and Factor V Leiden DNA Mutation Detection Systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Xpert HemosIL Factor II & Factor V Assay, a real-time PCR genotyping test for thrombophilia-associated mutations using the Cepheid GeneXpert Dx System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic genotyping test for rapid detection of Factor II (G20210A) and Factor V (Leiden) mutations from sodium citrate or EDTA anticoagulated whole blood, aiding in the diagnosis of individuals with suspected thrombophilia.
